name: iAnalyst
description:
iAnalyst.com is a leading internet solutions firm that specializes in Social Media Optimization, Search Engine Optimization, Location Based Marketing, Website Development, App Development, & Mobile Websites.
Our goal is to utilize the most powerful tools and resources on the internet to help grow our clients' businesses. We feel the internet has and will continue to revolutionize the way businesses and consumers interact and we love being a part of it. Our staff members are obsessed with studying the web landscape, looking for opportunities to use new platforms to increase our clients' exposure.
Founded in 2007, we have grown to become one of the leading East Coast full service digital agencies with offices in New York, Miami and Las Vegas. In addition to servicing clients directly, iAnalyst provides service and back-end support to other Digital Agencies across the globe.
READ MORE...
